message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your enthusiasm.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $8500. Would you be willing to come down a bit?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8750. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the value the product brings to you.
